descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jaren Jackson Jr. steps into the long 3-pointer and knocks it down.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jackson hits long 3 as shot clock expires) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jackson hits long 3 as shot clock expires

videos.description: Ziaire Williams shows off the hops getting way up for the alley-oop slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ziaire Williams finishes the lob with a one-handed slam) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ziaire Williams finishes the lob with a one-handed slam

videos.description: Steph Curry comes off the screen and knocks down the 3-pointer, right before the first-quarter buzzer sounds.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Curry splashes 3 to end the first) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Curry splashes 3 to end the first

videos.description: Klay Thompson wiggles around Desmond Bane and flips in the tough and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Klay flips in tough and-1) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Klay flips in tough and-1

videos.description: Ziaire Williams forces a Warriors timeout after he crams home the alley-oop dunk and slaps the backboard.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ziaire Williams slaps backboard after alley-oop dunk) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ziaire Williams slaps backboard after alley-oop dunk

videos.description: Andrew Wiggins drives down the lane and crushes home the dunk over multiple Memphis defenders.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Wiggins crams one on a few Memphis defenders) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wiggins crams one on a few Memphis defenders

videos.description: Ja Morant sends the Grizzlies to halftime with momentum as he knocks down the half-court shot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ja knocks down half-court buzzer-beater to end half) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ja knocks down half-court buzzer-beater to end half

videos.description: Klay Thompson forces a Grizzlies timeout after knocking down a wing 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Klay starts out the 2nd half hot with a long 3) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Klay starts out the 2nd half hot with a long 3

videos.description: Klay Thompson somehow hits the 3-pointer off one foot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Klay hits the 3 ... off one foot) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Klay hits the 3 ... off one foot

videos.description: Ja Morant attacks the basket and flies to the rim with a left-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Morant soars to the rim with the left) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Morant soars to the rim with the left

videos.description: Kyle Anderson goes at the Warriors and crushes the dunk over a couple defenders.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kyle Anderson takes on multiple Warriors for impressive jam) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kyle Anderson takes on multiple Warriors for impressive jam

videos.description: Jordan Poole forces a Grizzlies' timeout with a dunk and lets the crowd hear about it.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Poole fired up after dunk) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Poole fired up after dunk

videos.description: Ja Morant appears to hurt his knee and shows his frustration on the bench by slamming down a cushion.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ja frustrated on bench after apparent knee injury) 2022/05/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ja frustrated on bench after apparent knee injury

videos.description: The Warriors get a balanced scoring attack and overcome Ja Morant's 34 points to dominate the Grizzlies 142-112 to take a 2-1 series lead.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Warriors blow out Grizzlies in Game 3 to take 2-1 series lead) 2022/05/07 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Warriors blow out Grizzlies in Game 3 to take 2-1 series lead

videos.description: Memphis Grizzlies coach Taylor Jenkins is interested to see what the NBA does about Jordan Poole's play on Ja Morant.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Presser (Taylor Jenkins: 'Very curious’ how NBA will view Poole's play on Ja) 2022/05/07

videos.headline: Taylor Jenkins: 'Very curious' how NBA will view Poole's play on Ja
